net.sitecore.android.sdk.web

Class EventsPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sitecore.android.sdk.web.EventsPlugin

  • public class EventsPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
    Plugin for manipulating with phone events.

    Example : 

    function createEvent() {
          var event = scmobile.events.create({title: 'Event with title and description', notes: 'Event notes',
              location: 'Event location', alarm: '3600'});
          event.save(onSuccess, onError);
      }
    Since:
    Sitecore Mobile SDK for Android 1.1

      • getPluginJsCode

        public java.lang.String getPluginJsCode()
        Returns javascript code that will be attached to the page.

        This code defines what functionality of this plugin we will use from our page.

        Returns:
        String js code.

      • exec

        public void exec(java.lang.String method,
        net.sitecore.android.sdk.web.ScParams params,
        net.sitecore.android.sdk.web.ScCallbackContext callbackContext)
          throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates event based on received params.
        Parameters:
        method - String method name.
        params - ScParams params that will be used by action.
        callbackContext - ScCallbackContext callback for action.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if execution fails.
